mapper.select: SELECT U.user_no, U.user_id, U.user_name, U.user_type, U.app_status, U.acc_status, U.company_cd, U.email, U.phone, U.address, U.business_number, U.position, C.company_name, U.reg_dtime FROM TB_USERS U LEFT JOIN TB_COMPANIES C ON U.company_cd = C.company_cd ORDER BY U.reg_dtime DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_USERS SET app_status = 'APPROVED', acc_status = 'ACTIVE' WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND user_type = 'MASTER'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_USERS(user_id, password, user_name, user_type, app_status, acc_status, reg_dtime) VALUES (#{userId}, #{password}, #{userName}, 'ADMIN', 'APPROVED', 'ACTIVE', NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_USERS WHERE user_id = #{userId}
